About Tiger Brokers
Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Singapore, Tiger Brokers is an online broker with nearly 1,000 employees worldwide. It was listed on the NASDAQ exchange in the United States in 2019. In addition, Tiger Brokers has obtained 63 securities licenses or qualifications in Singapore, the United States, New Zealand, Australia, Hong Kong and other places. At present, it has more than 9 million users in the United States, Singapore, Australia, New Zealand and other places, and its annual transaction exceeds US$400 billion.
Tiger Brokers is committed to making investment easier, simpler and smarter, so that more people can enjoy the fun of investment. Customers can enjoy a one-stop trading experience through Tiger Stocks, investing in Hong Kong stocks, warrants, CBBCs, US stocks, fractional shares, ETFs and other financial products in major global markets. In addition, customers can invest in an fractional shares of US stocks with as low as US$5, and there are no handling fees and platform fees for Hong Kong stock transactions.

Tiger Brokers Features
Invest in the stocks of leading US companies with low costs
Customers can invest in fractional shares of leading US companies with as low as US$5. So even for investors who don’t have a lot of money, they can still buy blue chips with high stock prices.
Low investment commissions and charges
Tiger Brokers is characterized by low commission fees for stocks and ETFs, and does not charge other fees, such as custody fees, deposit and withdrawal fees, currency exchange fees, account idle fees, etc., which can effectively reduce investment costs.
Account opening can be completed in 3 minutes
Tiger Brokers’s account can be opened in just 3 minutes - the entire process is very convenient and can be done online. Also, the operation and management of the account can be carried out online, including depositing, withdrawing, trading stocks, etc.
Real-time in-depth market information
Tiger Brokers provides real-time in-depth market information to effectively assist users in grasping price trends for individual stocks. Now as long as you open an account, you can get free real-time streaming level 2 stock quotes for US Stocks.
One-stop trading experience
With Tiger Brokers’s account, customers can trade multiple markets around the world through one single account, including the United States, Hong Kong, Singapore, Shanghai and Shenzhen (China A-shares), Australia and other investment products such as stocks, options, warrants, ETFs, bonds, funds, etc., and support US stocks pre-market and after-hours trading.
